SELECT
f.customer_id AS customerId, f.type AS type, f.path AS path, c.id_card AS idCard, c.`name` AS name, c.cust_type AS custType
FROM loan_order o, loan_customer c, loan_file f
LEFT JOIN loan_info_supplement s ON s.id = f.info_supplement_id
WHERE
(o.loan_customer_id = c.id OR o.loan_customer_id = c.principal_cust_id)
AND f.customer_id = c.id
AND f.customer_id = #{customerId}
AND o.id = #{orderId}
AND f.type != 26
/*资料流转已提交*/ AND CASE WHEN f.upload_type = 1 THEN TRUE WHEN f.upload_type = 2 THEN s.status = 1 ELSE FALSE END
